short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automade.ai allows you to write any copy in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Automade.ai: the revolutionary new Google Chrome Extension that makes copywriting easier than ever before. Automade.ai is powered by AI, making it the perfect tool for boosting your productivity and creativity. With support for any website or web app, including Gmail, Notion, Jira, Slack, Google Docs, and many more, you'll be able to create content quickly and efficiently.

Automade.ai is the perfect solution for anyone looking to finish their work faster and more efficiently. With over 15 pre-made templates available, you can instantly create content with the click of a button. Plus, you can give the AI commands to generate content based on the information you provide. The AI can also easily change the tone of voice and translate in over 30 languages. And best of all, Automade.ai is free to use, so you can save time and money!

If you're looking for a reliable and effective copywriting tool, try Automade.ai. Download the Google Chrome Extension now and start experiencing the advantages of faster, more creative content creation. With its powerful algorithms and automated processes, Automade.ai is sure to make your copywriting a breeze!

Features:
+ Write copy based on your instructions in seconds
+ Write copy in any web app or website
+ Generate SQL queries in seconds
+ Generate Excel formulas in seconds
+ Select one of 50+ templates for even quicker copy  
+ Create your own templates
+ Write copy in 30+ Languages
+ Create variables to store information incl. companies and people
+ Format your copy easily with a text editor
